## Priority: [HIGH/MEDIUM/LOW]

### Rationale

This issue has been assigned **[PRIORITY]** priority based on the following factors:

**Impact:**
- [Describe the impact on users/system - e.g., "Affects all users", "Blocks critical workflow", "Minor UX improvement"]

**Urgency:**
- [Describe time sensitivity - e.g., "Blocking production deployment", "Required for upcoming release", "Can be addressed in future sprint"]

**Effort:**
- [Estimate complexity - e.g., "Quick fix (~1 hour)", "Moderate effort (~1 day)", "Large refactor (~1 week)"]

**Dependencies:**
- [List any blocking issues or prerequisites - e.g., "Blocked by #123", "No dependencies", "Requires design review"]
